Name: CVE-2009-2142
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in admin/index.asp in Zip Store Chat 4.0 and 5.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) login and (2) senha parameters.

Name: CVE-2009-2143
Description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in firestats-wordpress.php in the FireStats plugin before 1.6.2-stable for WordPress allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the fs_javascript parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2144
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in the FireStats plugin before 1.6.2-stable for WordPress allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2145
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in transLucid 1.75 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (a) NodeID and (b) action parameters to the default URI, and the (c) NodeID parameter to the default URI for the admin section; and allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (d) Title (aka page name) and (e) Url fields in a (1) new or (2) modified page.

Name: CVE-2009-2146
Description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the Compose Email feature in the Emails module in Sugar Community Edition (aka SugarCRM) before 5.2f allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with only an extension in its name, then accessing the file via a direct request to a modified filename under cache/modules/Emails/, as demonstrated using .php as the entire original name.

Name: CVE-2009-2147
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in fdown.php in phpWebThings 1.5.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2148
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in news/index.php in Campus Virtual-LMS allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2149
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Campus Virtual-LMS allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) courseid parameter to enrolments/step1.php, or the (2) search or (3) siteid parameter to files/shared_list.php.

Name: CVE-2009-2150
Description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Campus Virtual-LMS allow (1) remote attackers to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that terminate a session via login/logout.php, and might allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of certain users via a (2) ADD or (3) DELETE action to enrolments/step2.php.

Name: CVE-2009-2151
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in index.php in AdaptWeb 0.9.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the newlang parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2152
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in a_index.php in AdaptWeb 0.9.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the CodigoDisciplina parameter in a TopicosCadastro1 action.

Name: CVE-2009-2153
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in Impleo Music Collection 2.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the sort parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2154
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in admin/login.php in Impleo Music Collection 2.0, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the username parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2155
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in report/ReportViewAction.do in WebNMS Free Edition 5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the type parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

Name: CVE-2009-2156
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) the Title field to requests.php, related to viewrequests.php; and (2) the Torrent Name field to torrents-upload.php, related to the logging of torrent uploads; and allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (3) the ttversion parameter to themes/default/footer.php, the (4) SITENAME and (5) CURUSER[username] parameters to themes/default/header.php, (6) the todayactive parameter to visitorstoday.php, (7) the activepeople parameter to visitorsnow.php, (8) the faq_categ[999][title] parameter to faq.php, and (9) the keepget parameter to torrents-details.php.
References: BID:35369   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35369   |   BUGTRAQ:20090615 [waraxe-2009-SA#074] - Multiple Vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504294/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8958   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8958   |   MISC:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-74.html   |   SECUNIA:35456   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35456   |   XF:torrenttrader-multiplescripts-xss(51145)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51145   |   XF:torrenttrader-viewrequests-xss(51144)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51144

Name: CVE-2009-2157
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1) the origmsg parameter to account-inbox.php; the categ parameter to (2) delreq.php and (3) admin-delreq.php; (4) the choice parameter to index.php; (5) the id parameter to modrules.php in an edited (aka edit) action; the (6) user, (7) torrent, (8) forumid, and (9) forumpost parameters to report.php; (10) the delmp parameter to take-deletepm.php; (11) the delreport parameter to takedelreport.php; (12) the delreq parameter to takedelreq.php; (13) the clases parameter to takestaffmess.php; and (14) the warndisable parameter to takewarndisable.php; and allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via (15) the wherecatin parameter to browse.php, (16) the limit parameter to today.php, and (17) the where parameter to torrents-details.php.
References: BID:35369   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35369   |   BUGTRAQ:20090615 [waraxe-2009-SA#074] - Multiple Vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504294/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8958   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8958   |   MISC:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-74.html   |   SECUNIA:35456   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35456   |   XF:torrenttrader-accountinbox-sql-injection(51143)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51143   |   XF:torrenttrader-browse-sql-injection(51142)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51142   |   XF:torrenttrader-choice-sql-injection(51179)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51179   |   XF:torrenttrader-delreq-sql-injection(51178)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51178   |   XF:torrenttrader-modrules-sql-injection(51180)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51180   |   XF:torrenttrader-report-sql-injection(51181)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51181

Name: CVE-2009-2158
Description: account-recover.php in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09 chooses random passwords from an insufficiently large set, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain a password via a brute-force attack.
References: BID:35369   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35369   |   BUGTRAQ:20090615 [waraxe-2009-SA#074] - Multiple Vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504294/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8958   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8958   |   MISC:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-74.html   |   XF:torrenttrader-accountrecover-weak-security(51150)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51150

Name: CVE-2009-2159
Description: backup-database.php in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09 does not require administrative authentication, which allows remote attackers to create and download a backup database by making a direct request and then retrieving a .gz file from backups/.
References: BID:35369   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35369   |   BUGTRAQ:20090615 [waraxe-2009-SA#074] - Multiple Vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504294/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8958   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8958   |   MISC:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-74.html   |   SECUNIA:35456   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35456   |   XF:torrenttrader-backupdatabase-info-disc(51147)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51147

Name: CVE-2009-2160
Description: TorrentTrader Classic 1.09 allows remote attackers to (1) obtain configuration information via a direct request to phpinfo.php, which calls the phpinfo function; and allows remote attackers to (2) obtain other potentially sensitive information via a direct request to check.php.
References: BID:35369   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35369   |   BUGTRAQ:20090615 [waraxe-2009-SA#074] - Multiple Vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504294/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8958   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8958   |   MISC:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-74.html   |   SECUNIA:35456   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35456   |   XF:torrenttrader-check-info-disclosure(51148)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51148   |   XF:torrenttrader-phpinfo-info-disclosure(51149)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51149

Name: CVE-2009-2161
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in backend/admin-functions.php in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09, when used on a case-insensitive web site, allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the ss_uri parameter, in conjunction with a modified component name.
References: BID:35369   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35369   |   BUGTRAQ:20090615 [waraxe-2009-SA#074] - Multiple Vulnerabilities in TorrentTrader Classic 1.09   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504294/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8958   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8958   |   MISC:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-74.html   |   SECUNIA:35456   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35456   |   XF:torrenttrader-ssuri-file-include(51146)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51146

Name: CVE-2009-2162
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the XOOPS MANIAC PukiWikiMod module 1.6.6.2 and earlier for XOOPS allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
References: CONFIRM:http://xoops.hypweb.net/wiki/6005.html   |   JVN:JVN#12244807   |   URL:http://jvn.jp/en/jp/JVN12244807/index.html   |   JVNDB:JVNDB-2009-000041   |   URL:http://jvndb.jvn.jp/ja/contents/2009/JVNDB-2009-000041.html   |   OSVDB:55189   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55189   |   SECUNIA:35504   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35504   |   XF:pukiwikimod-unspecified-xss(51260)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51260

Name: CVE-2009-2163
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in login/default.aspx in Sitecore CMS before 6.0.2 Update-1 090507 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the sc_error parameter.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090603 [InterN0T] SiteCore.NET 6.0.0 - XSS Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504093/100/0/threaded   |   BUGTRAQ:20090605 Re: [InterN0T] SiteCore.NET 6.0.0 - XSS Vulnerability-fixed   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504132/100/0/threaded   |   MISC:http://forum.intern0t.net/intern0t-advisories/1082-intern0t-sitecore-net-6-0-0-cross-site-scripting-vulnerability.html   |   SECUNIA:35353   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35353

Name: CVE-2009-2164
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Kjtechforce mailman beta1, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1) the code parameter to activate.php or (2) the dest parameter to index.php.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090605 ('dest') Blind (SQLi) EXPLOIT --Kjtechforce mailman Beta-1 -->   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504136/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8884   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8884   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8885   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8885

Name: CVE-2009-2165
Description: SerendipityNZ (aka SimpleBoxes) Serene Bach 2.20R and earlier, and 3.00 beta023 and earlier 3.x versions, uses a predictable session id, which makes it easier for remote attackers to hijack sessions via a modified id.

Name: CVE-2009-2166
Description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in cvs.php in OCS Inventory NG before 1.02.1 on Unix allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a full pathname in the log parameter.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090602 OCS Inventory NG 1.02 - Directory Traversal   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504047/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8868   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8868   |   MISC:http://www.leidecker.info/advisories/2009-05-30-ocs_inventory_ng_directory_traversal.shtml   |   XF:ocsinventory-cvs-info-disclosure(50946)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/50946

Name: CVE-2009-2167
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in cpanel/login.php in EgyPlus 7ammel (aka 7ml) 1.0.1 and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) username or (2) password parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2168
Description: cpanel/login.php in EgyPlus 7ammel (aka 7ml) 1.0.1 and earlier sends a redirect to the web browser but does not exit when the supplied credentials are incorrect, which allows remote attackers to bypass authentication by providing arbitrary username and password parameters.

Name: CVE-2009-2169
Description: Insecure method vulnerability in the PDFVIEWER.PDFViewerCtrl.1 ActiveX control (pdfviewer.ocx) in Edraw PDF Viewer Component before 3.2.0.126 allows remote attackers to create and overwrite arbitrary files via a URL argument to the FtpConnect argument and a target filename argument to the FtpDownloadFile method.  NOTE: this can be leveraged for code execution by writing to a Startup folder.
References: FULLDISC:20090618 Edraw PDF Viewer Component ActiveX Remote code execution vulnerability   |   URL:http://archives.neohapsis.com/archives/fulldisclosure/2009-06/0198.html   |   SECUNIA:35509   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35509

Name: CVE-2009-2170
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Mahara 1.0 before 1.0.12 and 1.1 before 1.1.5 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unknown vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2171
Description: Mahara 1.1 before 1.1.5 does not apply permission checks when saving a view that contains artefacts, which allows remote authenticated users to read another user's artefact.

Name: CVE-2009-2172
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in forum/radioandtv.php in the Radio and TV Player addon for vBulletin allows remote registered users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the station parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2173
Description: The LAN game feature in Carom3D 5.06 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (application hang) via a crafted HTTP request to TCP port 28012.

Name: CVE-2009-2174
Description: GUPnP 0.12.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via an empty (1) subscription or (2) control message.
References: BID:35390   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35390   |   CONFIRM:http://bugzilla.openedhand.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1604   |   CONFIRM:http://git.gupnp.org/cgit.cgi?url=gupnp/tree/NEWS&id=ce714a6700ce03953a2886a66ec57db59205f4e6   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2009-5861   |   URL:https://www.redhat.com/archives/fedora-package-announce/2009-June/msg00607.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2009-5865   |   URL:https://www.redhat.com/archives/fedora-package-announce/2009-June/msg00494.html   |   OSVDB:55128   |   URL:http://www.osvdb.org/55128   |   SECUNIA:35472   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35472   |   SECUNIA:35482   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35482   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-1597   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/1597

Name: CVE-2009-2175
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the flattenIncrementally function in flatten.c in xcftools 1.0.4, as reachable from the (1) xcf2pnm and (2) xcf2png utilities, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted image that causes a conversion to a location "above or to the left of the canvas." NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.
References: BID:43883   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/43883   |   CONFIRM:http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=533361   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2010-17004   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2010-November/050562.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2010-17035   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2010-November/050542.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2010-17041   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2010-November/050526.html   |   OSVDB:55187   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55187   |   SECUNIA:35397   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35397   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-1638   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/1638

Name: CVE-2009-2176
Description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in fuzzylime (cms) 3.03a and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allow remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via directory traversal sequences in the (1) list parameter to code/confirm.php and the (2) template parameter to code/display.php.
References: BID:35418   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35418   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8978   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8978   |   OSVDB:55182   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55182   |   OSVDB:55183   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55183   |   SECUNIA:35489   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35489   |   XF:fuzzylimecms-confirm-display-file-include(51205)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51205

Name: CVE-2009-2177
Description: code/display.php in fuzzylime (cms) 3.03a and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks and overwrite arbitrary files via a "....//" (dot dot) in the s parameter, which is collapsed into a "../" value.
References: BID:35418   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35418   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8978   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8978   |   OSVDB:55184   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55184   |   SECUNIA:35489   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35489   |   XF:fuzzylimecms-display-file-overwrite(51206)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51206

Name: CVE-2009-2178
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in website.php in phpDatingClub 3.7 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the page parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2179
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in search.php in phpDatingClub 3.7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the sform[day] parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2180
Description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in upfiles/index.php in Pc4 Uploader 10.0 and earlier allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via (1) a .. (dot dot) or (2) absolute path in the file parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2181
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in admin-files/templates/list_dir.php in Campsite 3.3.0 RC1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the listbasedir parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2182
Description: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in Campsite 3.3.0 RC1 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the GLOBALS[g_campsiteDir] parameter to (1) ad_popup.php, (2) camp_html.php, (3) init_content.php, (4) logout.php, (5) menu.php, and (6) set-author.php in admin-files/; (7) conf/liveuser_configuration.php; (8) include/phorum_load.php; (9) CommandProcessor.php and (10) index.php in admin-files/article_import; and (11) add.php, (12) add_move.php, (13) autopublish.php, and (14) autopublish_del.php in admin-files/articles/.

Name: CVE-2009-2183
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in admin-files/ad.php in Campsite 3.3.0 RC1 allows remote attackers to read and possibly execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the GLOBALS[g_campsiteDir] parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2184
Description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in forcedownload.php in Gravy Media Photo Host 1.0.8 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via an encoded "/" (slash) in the file parameter.
References: EXPLOIT-DB:8996   |   URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8996   |   OSVDB:55280   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55280   |   SECUNIA:35518   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35518   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-1651   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/1651   |   XF:gravy-file-file-download(51299)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51299

Name: CVE-2009-2185
Description: The ASN.1 parser (pluto/asn1.c, libstrongswan/asn1/asn1.c, libstrongswan/asn1/asn1_parser.c) in (a) strongSwan 2.8 before 2.8.10, 4.2 before 4.2.16, and 4.3 before 4.3.2; and (b) openSwan 2.6 before 2.6.22 and 2.4 before 2.4.15 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (pluto IKE daemon crash) via an X.509 certificate with (1) crafted Relative Distinguished Names (RDNs), (2) a crafted UTCTIME string, or (3) a crafted GENERALIZEDTIME string.

Name: CVE-2009-2186
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Shockwave Player before 11.0.0.465 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2009-1860, related to an older issue that "was previously resolved in Shockwave Player 11.0.0.465."

Name: CVE-2009-2187
Description: Multiple memory leaks in the (1) IP and (2) IPv6 multicast implementation in the kernel in Sun Solaris 10, and OpenSolaris snv_67 through snv_93, allow local users to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via vectors related to the association of (a) DL_ENABMULTI_REQ and (b) DL_DISABMULTI_REQ messages with ARP messages.

Name: CVE-2009-2188
Description: Buffer overflow in ImageIO in Apple Mac OS X 10.5 before 10.5.8, and Safari before 4.0.3, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via an image with crafted EXIF metadata.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-05-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00001.html   |   APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-11-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00002.html   |   BID:35954   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35954   |   CERT:TA09-218A   |   URL:http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/techalerts/TA09-218A.html   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3733   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3757   |   OSVDB:56842   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56842   |   SECTRACK:1022674   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022674   |   SECUNIA:36096   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36096   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2172   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2172   |   XF:safari-exif-bo(52386)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52386

Name: CVE-2009-2189
Description: The ICMPv6 implementation on the Apple Time Capsule, AirPort Extreme Base Station, and AirPort Express Base Station with firmware before 7.5.2 does not limit the rate of (1) Router Advertisement and (2) Neighbor Discovery packets, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (resource consumption and device restart) by sending many packets.

Name: CVE-2009-2190
Description: launchd in Apple Mac OS X 10.5 before 10.5.8 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (individual service outage) by making many connections to an inetd-based launchd service.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-05-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:35954   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35954   |   CERT:TA09-218A   |   URL:http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/techalerts/TA09-218A.html   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3757   |   OSVDB:56841   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56841   |   SECTRACK:1022672   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022672   |   SECUNIA:36096   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36096   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2172   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2172   |   XF:macosx-launchd-dos(52425)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52425

Name: CVE-2009-2191
Description: Format string vulnerability in Login Window in Apple Mac OS X 10.4.11 and 10.5 before 10.5.8 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via format string specifiers in an application name.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-05-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:35954   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35954   |   CERT:TA09-218A   |   URL:http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/techalerts/TA09-218A.html   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3757   |   OSVDB:56840   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56840   |   SECUNIA:36096   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36096   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2172   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2172   |   XF:macosx-loginwindow-format-string(52428)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52428

Name: CVE-2009-2192
Description: MobileMe in Apple Mac OS X 10.5 before 10.5.8 does not properly delete credentials upon signout from the preference pane, which makes it easier for attackers to hijack a MobileMe session via unspecified vectors, related to a "logic issue."
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-05-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:35954   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35954   |   CERT:TA09-218A   |   URL:http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/techalerts/TA09-218A.html   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3757   |   OSVDB:56839   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56839   |   SECUNIA:36096   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36096   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2172   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2172   |   XF:macosx-mobileme-session-hijack(52432)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52432

Name: CVE-2009-2193
Description: Buffer overflow in the kernel in Apple Mac OS X 10.5 before 10.5.8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (system crash) via a crafted AppleTalk response packet.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-05-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:35954   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35954   |   CERT:TA09-218A   |   URL:http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/techalerts/TA09-218A.html   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3757   |   OSVDB:56838   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56838   |   SECTRACK:1022674   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022674   |   SECUNIA:36096   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36096   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2172   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2172   |   XF:macosx-appletalk-kernel-bo(52435)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52435

Name: CVE-2009-2194
Description: Apple Mac OS X 10.5 before 10.5.8 does not properly share file descriptors over local sockets, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash) by placing file descriptors in messages sent to a socket that has no receiver, related to a "synchronization issue."
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-05-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:35954   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35954   |   CERT:TA09-218A   |   URL:http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/techalerts/TA09-218A.html   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3757   |   OSVDB:56836   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56836   |   SECTRACK:1022672   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022672   |   SECUNIA:36096   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36096   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2172   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2172   |   XF:macosx-descriptor-dos(52439)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52439

Name: CVE-2009-2195
Description: Buffer overflow in WebKit in Apple Safari before 4.0.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via crafted floating-point numbers.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-11-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00002.html   |   APPLE:APPLE-SA-2010-06-21-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2010/Jun/msg00003.html   |   BID:36023   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36023   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3733   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4225   |   SECTRACK:1022717   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022717   |   SECUNIA:43068   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/43068   |   SUSE:SUSE-SR:2011:002   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2011-01/msg00006.html   |   VUPEN:ADV-2011-0212   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2011/0212

Name: CVE-2009-2196
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Apple Safari 4 before 4.0.3 allows remote web servers to place an arbitrary web site in the Top Sites view, and possibly conduct phishing attacks, via unknown vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2197
Description: Apple Safari before 9.1 allows remote attackers to spoof the user interface via a web page that places text in a crafted context, leading to unintended use of that text within a Safari dialog.

Name: CVE-2009-2198
Description: Apple GarageBand before 5.1 reconfigures Safari to accept all cookies regardless of domain name, which makes it easier for remote web servers to track users.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-03-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00000.html   |   BID:35926   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35926   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3732   |   OSVDB:56738   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/56738   |   SECTRACK:1022649   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022649   |   SECUNIA:36114   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36114   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2141   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2141   |   XF:garageband-safari-info-disclosure(52248)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/52248

Name: CVE-2009-2199
Description: Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in WebKit in Apple Safari before 4.0.3, as used on iPhone OS before 3.1, iPhone OS before 3.1.1 for iPod touch, and other platforms, allows remote attackers to spoof domain names in URLs, and possibly conduct phishing attacks, via unspecified homoglyphs.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-11-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00002.html   |   APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-09-09-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Sep/msg00001.html   |   BID:36026   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36026   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3733   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3860   |   SECTRACK:1022719   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022719   |   SECUNIA:36677   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36677   |   SECUNIA:43068   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/43068   |   SUSE:SUSE-SR:2011:002   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2011-01/msg00006.html   |   VUPEN:ADV-2011-0212   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2011/0212

Name: CVE-2009-2200
Description: WebKit in Apple Safari before 4.0.3 does not properly restrict the URL scheme of the pluginspage attribute of an EMBED element, which allows user-assisted remote attackers to launch arbitrary file: URLs and obtain sensitive information via a crafted HTML document.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-08-11-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Aug/msg00002.html   |   BID:36024   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36024   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3733   |   SECTRACK:1022720   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022720   |   SECUNIA:43068   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/43068   |   SUSE:SUSE-SR:2011:002   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2011-01/msg00006.html   |   VUPEN:ADV-2011-0212   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2011/0212

Name: CVE-2009-2201
Description: The screensharing feature in the Admin application in Apple Xsan before 2.2 places a cleartext username and password in a URL within an error dialog, which allows physically proximate attackers to obtain credentials by reading this dialog.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-09-14-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Sep/msg00005.html   |   BID:36385   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36385   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3797   |   OSVDB:58133   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/58133   |   SECTRACK:1022904   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022904   |   SECUNIA:36673   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36673   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2644   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2644   |   XF:xsan-admin-information-disclosure(53232)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53232

Name: CVE-2009-2202
Description: Apple QuickTime before 7.6.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted H.264 movie file.

Name: CVE-2009-2203
Description: Buffer overflow in Apple QuickTime before 7.6.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted MPEG-4 video file.

Name: CVE-2009-2204
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the CoreTelephony component in Apple iPhone OS before 3.0.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, obtain GPS coordinates, or enable the microphone via an SMS message that triggers memory corruption, as demonstrated by Charlie Miller at SyScan '09 Singapore.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-07-31-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Jul/msg00001.html   |   BID:35569   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35569   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3754   |   MISC:http://news.cnet.com/8301-1009_3-10278472-83.html   |   MISC:http://www.blackhat.com/presentations/bh-usa-09/MILLER/BHUSA09-Miller-FuzzingPhone-PAPER.pdf   |   MISC:http://www.syscan.org/Sg/program.html   |   OSVDB:55687   |   URL:http://www.osvdb.org/55687   |   SECTRACK:1022626   |   URL:http://securitytracker.com/id?1022626   |   SECUNIA:36070   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36070   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-2105   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/2105

Name: CVE-2009-2205
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Java Web Start command launcher in Java for Mac OS X 10.5 before Update 5 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2206
Description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in the AudioCodecs library in the CoreAudio component in Apple iPhone OS before 3.1, and iPhone OS before 3.1.1 for iPod touch, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted (1) AAC or (2) MP3 file, as demonstrated by a ringtone with malformed entries in the sample size table.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2009-09-09-1   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2009/Sep/msg00001.html   |   BID:36338   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36338   |   BUGTRAQ:20090914 [TKADV2009-007] Apple iPhone OS AudioCodecs Heap Buffer Overflow   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/506464/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3860   |   MISC:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2009-007.txt   |   SECTRACK:1022869   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id?1022869   |   SECUNIA:36677   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/36677   |   XF:ipod-iphone-aac-mp3-bo(53180)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53180

Name: CVE-2009-2207
Description: The MobileMail component in Apple iPhone OS 3.0 and 3.0.1, and iPhone OS 3.0 for iPod touch, lists deleted e-mail messages in Spotlight search results, which might allow local users to obtain sensitive information by reading these messages.

Name: CVE-2009-2208
Description: FreeBSD 6.3, 6.4, 7.1, and 7.2 does not enforce permissions on the SIOCSIFINFO_IN6 IOCTL, which allows local users to modify or disable IPv6 network interfaces, as demonstrated by modifying the MTU.

Name: CVE-2009-2209
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in rscms_mod_newsview.php in RS-CMS 2.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the key parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2210
Description: Mozilla Thunderbird before 2.0.0.22 and SeaMonkey before 1.1.17 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a multipart/alternative e-mail message containing a text/enhanced part that triggers access to an incorrect object type.
References: BID:35461   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35461   |   CONFIRM:http://www.mozilla.org/security/announce/2009/mfsa2009-33.html   |   CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=495057   |   DEBIAN:DSA-1830   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2009/dsa-1830   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2009-7567   |   URL:https://www.redhat.com/archives/fedora-package-announce/2009-July/msg00444.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2009-7614   |   URL:https://www.redhat.com/archives/fedora-package-announce/2009-July/msg00504.html   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2009:141   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2009:141   |   OVAL:oval:org.mitre.oval:def:9994   |   URL:https://oval.cisecurity.org/repository/search/definition/oval%3Aorg.mitre.oval%3Adef%3A9994   |   REDHAT:RHSA-2009:1134   |   URL:http://www.redhat.com/support/errata/RHSA-2009-1134.html   |   SECTRACK:1022433   |   URL:http://securitytracker.com/id?1022433   |   SECUNIA:35561   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35561   |   SECUNIA:35602   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35602   |   SECUNIA:35633   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35633   |   SECUNIA:35882   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35882   |   SLACKWARE:SSA:2009-176-01   |   URL:http://slackware.com/security/viewer.php?l=slackware-security&y=2009&m=slackware-security.425408   |   SLACKWARE:SSA:2009-178-01   |   URL:http://www.slackware.com/security/viewer.php?l=slackware-security&y=2009&m=slackware-security.454275   |   XF:mozilla-multipart-alternative-code-exec(51315)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51315

Name: CVE-2009-2211
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the CQWeb server in IBM Rational ClearQuest 7.0.0 before 7.0.0.6 and 7.0.1 before 7.0.1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2212
Description: The CQWeb server in IBM Rational ClearQuest 7.0.0 before 7.0.0.6 and 7.0.1 before 7.0.1.5 allows attackers to discover a (1) username or (2) password via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2213
Description: The default configuration of the Security global settings on the Citrix NetScaler Access Gateway appliance with Enterprise Edition firmware 9.0, 8.1, and earlier specifies Allow for the Default Authorization Action option, which might allow remote authenticated users to bypass intended access restrictions.

Name: CVE-2009-2214
Description: The Secure Gateway service in Citrix Secure Gateway 3.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via an unspecified request.

Name: CVE-2009-2215
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in URD before 0.6.2 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to the fatal_error page and unspecified other components.

Name: CVE-2009-2216
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CMD_REDIRECT in DirectAdmin 1.33.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the URI in a view=advanced request.

Name: CVE-2009-2217
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in NBBC before 1.4.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an invalid URL in a BBCode img tag.

Name: CVE-2009-2218
Description: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in phpCollegeExchange 0.1.5c, when register_globals is enabled, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the home parameter to (1) i_head.php, (2) i_nav.php, (3) user_new_2.php, or (4) house/myrents.php; or (5) allbooks.php, (6) home.php, or (7) mybooks.php in books/.  NOTE: house/myrents.php was also separately reported as a local file inclusion issue.

Name: CVE-2009-2219
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpCollegeExchange 0.1.5c allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) _SESSION[handle] parameter to (a) home.php, (b) books/allbooks.php, or (c) books/home.php; or the (2) home parameter to (d) i_head.php or (e) i_nav.php, or (f) allbooks.php, (g) home.php, or (h) i_nav.php in books/.

Name: CVE-2009-2220
Description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in Tribiq CMS 5.0.12c, when register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allow remote attackers to include and possibly execute arbitrary files via directory traversal sequences in the template_path parameter to (1) masthead.inc.php, (2) toppanel.inc.php, and (3) contact.inc.php in templates/mytribiqsite/tribiq-CL-9000/includes; and the use_template_family parameter to (4) templates/mytribiqsite/tribiq-CL-9000/includes/nlarlist_content.inc.php. NOTE: the tribal-GPL-1066/includes/header.inc.php vector is already covered by CVE-2008-4894.

Name: CVE-2009-2221
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PHP-I-BOARD 1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2222
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in PHP-I-BOARD 1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via directory traversal sequences in unspecified vectors, probably related to mail.

Name: CVE-2009-2223
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in locms/smarty.php in LightOpenCMS 0.1 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the cwd parameter.  NOTE: remote file inclusion attacks may be possible.

Name: CVE-2009-2224
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in ang/shared/flags.php in AN Guestbook 0.7.8, when register_globals is enabled, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the g_lang parameter.
References: BID:35486   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35486   |   EXPLOIT-DB:9013   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/9013   |   VIM:20090626 false? AN Guestbook LFI   |   URL:http://www.attrition.org/pipermail/vim/2009-June/002196.html

Name: CVE-2009-2225
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in SureThing CD/DVD Labeler 5.1.616 trial version allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted (1) m3u or (2) pls playlist file.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
References: BID:43852   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/43852   |   OSVDB:55297   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55297   |   SECUNIA:35361   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35361   |   XF:surething-m3u-bo(51331)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51331

Name: CVE-2009-2226
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Let's PHP! Tree BBS 2004/11/23 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2227
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in B Labs Bopup Communication Server 3.2.26.5460 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted request to TCP port 19810.
References: EXPLOIT-DB:9002   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/9002   |   OSVDB:55275   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/55275   |   SECUNIA:35516   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35516   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-1645   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/1645   |   XF:bopup-unspecified-bo(51305)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51305

Name: CVE-2009-2228
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in engine.php in Kasseler CMS allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the url parameter in a redirect action.

Name: CVE-2009-2229
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in engine.php in Kasseler CMS 1.3.5 lite allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the file parameter during a download action, a different vector than CVE-2008-3087.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

Name: CVE-2009-2230
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in inc/datahandlers/user.php in MyBB (aka MyBulletinBoard) before 1.4.7 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the birthdayprivacy parameter.
References: BID:35458   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35458   |   CONFIRM:http://blog.mybboard.net/2009/06/15/mybb-147-released-security-update/   |   CONFIRM:http://mybboard.net/download/104   |   EXPLOIT-DB:9001   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/9001   |   SECUNIA:35517   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35517   |   VUPEN:ADV-2009-1653   |   URL:http://www.vupen.com/english/advisories/2009/1653

Name: CVE-2009-2231
Description: MIDAS 1.43 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication and obtain administrative access via an admin account record in a MIDAS cookie.

Name: CVE-2009-2232
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in image.php in Softbiz Banner Ad Management Script allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the size_id parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

Name: CVE-2009-2233
Description: The admin interface in AWScripts.com Gallery Search Engine 1.5 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication and gain administrative access by setting the awse_logged cookie to 1.

Name: CVE-2009-2234
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in admin.php in VICIDIAL Call Center Suite 2.0.5-173 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) Username parameter ($PHP_AUTH_USER) and (2) Password parameter ($PHP_AUTH_PW).

Name: CVE-2009-2235
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in page.php in Your Articles Directory allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2236
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in yad-admin/login.php in Your Article Directory allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the txtAdminEmail parameter.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

Name: CVE-2009-2237
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Views Bulk Operations 5.x-1.x before 5.x-1.4 and 6.x-1.x before 6.x-1.7, a module for Drupal, allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions and modify "nodes or classes of nodes" via unknown vectors, probably related to registered procedures (aka actions).

Name: CVE-2009-2238
Description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in includes/shared_scripts/wysiwyg_editor/assetmanager/assetmanager.asp in DMXReady Registration Manager 1.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension, then accessing it via a direct request to the file in assets/webblogmanager.
References: BID:35039   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35039   |   BUGTRAQ:20090520 DMXReady Registration Manager Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/503648/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8749   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8749   |   XF:rm-assetmanager-file-upload(50651)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/50651

Name: CVE-2009-2239
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in the (1) casinobase (com_casinobase), (2) casino_blackjack (com_casino_blackjack), and (3) casino_videopoker (com_casino_videopoker) components 0.3.1 for Joomla! allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the Itemid parameter to index.php.

Name: CVE-2009-2240
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in AD2000 free-sw leger (aka Web Conference Room Free) 1.6.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2009-2241
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in search.asp in ASP Inline Corporate Calendar allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the keyword parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2242
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in active_appointments.asp in ASP Inline Corporate Calendar allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the order parameter.

Name: CVE-2009-2243
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in active_appointments.asp in ASP Inline Corporate Calendar allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the sortby parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

Name: CVE-2009-2254
Description: Zen Cart 1.3.8a, 1.3.8, and earlier does not require administrative authentication for admin/sqlpatch.php, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the query_string parameter in an execute action, in conjunction with a PATH_INFO of password_forgotten.php, related to a "SQL Execution" issue.
References: BID:35468   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35468   |   CONFIRM:http://www.zen-cart.com/forum/attachment.php?attachmentid=5965   |   CONFIRM:http://www.zen-cart.com/forum/showthread.php?t=130161   |   EXPLOIT-DB:9005   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/9005   |   OSVDB:55343   |   URL:http://www.osvdb.org/55343   |   SECUNIA:35550   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35550   |   XF:zencart-sqlpatch-sql-injection(51317)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51317

Name: CVE-2009-2255
Description: Zen Cart 1.3.8a, 1.3.8, and earlier does not require administrative authentication for admin/record_company.php, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a .php file via the record_company_image parameter in conjunction with a PATH_INFO of password_forgotten.php, then accessing this file via a direct request to the file in images/.
References: BID:35467   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/35467   |   CONFIRM:http://www.zen-cart.com/forum/attachment.php?attachmentid=5965   |   CONFIRM:http://www.zen-cart.com/forum/showthread.php?t=130161   |   EXPLOIT-DB:9004   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/9004   |   OSVDB:55344   |   URL:http://www.osvdb.org/55344   |   SECUNIA:35550   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/35550   |   XF:zencart-recordcompany-code-execution(51316)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/51316

Name: CVE-2009-2256
Description: The administrative web interface on the Netgear DG632 with firmware 3.4.0_ap allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (web outage) via an HTTP POST request to cgi-bin/firmwarecfg.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090615 Re: Netgear DG632 Router Remote DoS Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504341/100/0/threaded   |   BUGTRAQ:20090616 Re[2]: [Full-disclosure] Netgear DG632 Router Remote DoS Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504345/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8964   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8964   |   MISC:http://www.tomneaves.co.uk/Netgear_DG632_Remote_DoS.txt   |   SECTRACK:1022403   |   URL:http://securitytracker.com/id?1022403

Name: CVE-2009-2257
Description: The administrative web interface on the Netgear DG632 with firmware 3.4.0_ap allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a direct request to (1) gateway/commands/saveconfig.html, and (2) stattbl.htm, (3) modemmenu.htm, (4) onload.htm, (5) form.css, (6) utility.js, and possibly (7) indextop.htm in html/.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090615 Netgear DG632 Router Authentication Bypass Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504312/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8963   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8963   |   MISC:http://www.tomneaves.co.uk/Netgear_DG632_Authentication_Bypass.txt   |   SECTRACK:1022404   |   URL:http://securitytracker.com/id?1022404

Name: CVE-2009-2258
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in cgi-bin/webcm in the administrative web interface on the Netgear DG632 with firmware 3.4.0_ap allows remote attackers to list arbitrary directories via a .. (dot dot) in the nextpage parameter.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090615 Netgear DG632 Router Authentication Bypass Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504312/100/0/threaded   |   EXPLOIT-DB:8963   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/8963   |   MISC:http://www.tomneaves.co.uk/Netgear_DG632_Authentication_Bypass.txt   |   SECTRACK:1022404   |   URL:http://securitytracker.com/id?1022404

Name: CVE-2009-2259
Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2009-2608.  Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2009-2608.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2009-2608 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

Name: CVE-2009-2260
Description: stardict 3.0.1, when Enable Net Dict is configured, sends the contents of the clipboard to a dictionary server, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by sniffing the network.

Name: CVE-2009-2261
Description: PeaZIP 2.6.1, 2.5.1, and earlier on Windows allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a .zip archive with a .txt file whose name contains | (pipe) characters and a command.

Name: CVE-2009-2262
Description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in install/di.php in AjaxPortal 3.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the pathtoserverdata parameter.  NOTE: the installation instructions specify deleting the install/ folder.
References: BUGTRAQ:20090629 AjaxPortal v3.0 Remote File Inclusion Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504618/100/0/threaded

Name: CVE-2009-2263
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in index.php in Awesome PHP Mega File Manager 1.0 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the page parameter.  NOTE: in some environments, this can be leveraged for remote file inclusion by using a UNC share pathname or an ftp, ftps, or ssh2.sftp URL.
